name: My First Tower Defense Game
description:
This is my first game and I am currently one month into learning game development,  feel free to leave any feedback you feel would contribute to the game or my learning experience, this game is more a demo and probably would not be considered all that fun by any means yet, I will be updating the game daily though so check it out regularly if you are interested in watching the game take shape.

Follow me on Instagram at @Game_Dev_Cade  for daily updates and messaging

https://www.instagram.com/game_dev_cade/?hl=en

You can also check me out on YouTube at   "Game Dev Cade"   as well.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIHRP_NZT_CUIGhyyWFsXkw?view_as=subscriber
